name: Closed benchmarks
short_description:
This program generates a closed benchmark using, as initial structure, the user supplied network. 

For more information, please refer to:

Closed benchmarks for network community structure characterization. 
Rodrigo Aldecoa and Ignacio Marín
Physical Review E 85, 026109 (2012)


Latest source code in: https://github.com/raldecoa/ClosedBenchmarks
summary: Closed benchmarks for network community structure characterization
